text: Alborada (English: The Dawning), is a Mexican telenovela with the participation of Lucero and Fernando Colunga. This telenovela deals with the Viceroyalty of New Spain, years before the Mexican War of Independence, and is also about events such as the Holy Inquisition (Also known as the Mexican Inquisition), the main song "Alborada" would be composed by Jorge Avedaño and performed by the tenor Plácido Domingo. == Plot == Hipolita Díaz (Lucero), a young woman who lives with her mother, who is due to marry Antonio de Guzmán (Arturo Peniche), Hipolita due to not loving him, she has to put up with it all the time. Don Luis Manrique (Fernando Colunga), Cousin of Diego Arellano (Luis Roberto Guzmán), the renowned Count of Guevara, sometimes compete with each other, and after a trip to Panama, he would meet Hipolita, and they would have a romance that would give birth to a a man named Rafael (Alexander Renaud), and they would have to act like they would not have a romance with each other, even though they would have to face many problems with Antonio de Guzmán, Juana Arellano (Daniela Romo) and the Count de Guevara himself. == Casting == === Main cast === * Lucero -
